main.title: TT_Transactions
button.refresh.tooltip: TT_This page refreshes automatically with each new block
status.couldNotGet.cacheRebuilding: TT_Could not get wallet transactions, cache is still building, please try later. At block %1$s of %2$s (%3$s complete)
status.couldNotGet: TT_Could not get wallet transactions, CacheState=%1$s.
status.error.corrupt: TT_If this problem continues, then please resync NodeCore from scratch or the latest bootstrapping file.
apiMessage.noBestBlockFound: TT_No best block could be found at index, possible nodecore.dat corruption
refreshCache.warning:
TT_This will rebuild all the cached transactions in your wallet cache. It will NOT change your balance nor send new transactions.
This is a troubleshooting action if your wallet transactions appear corrupt.
If your transactions are showing correctly, then you do not need to rebuild this.
It could take a long time to rebuild.
Do you want to rebuild your wallet cache?
refreshCache.warning.proceed: TT_Wallet cache rebuilding. This will take some time, check back on this page later...
